Next stop: Sweden. 

This young girl along with her mother and six brothers and sisters is ready for a new life. She's among the lucky few who are resettled to safe third countries.

title: UNHCR in Bangladesh
subtitle:
Korean  Ambassador to Bangladesh, Mr. Hu Kang-Il visited Cox's Bazar yesterday to observe progress of UNHCR activities with Rohingya refugees.
